verses.verse: And they took their journey<WH5265> from Elim,<WH4480> <WH362> and all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> unto<WH413> the wilderness<WH4057> of Sin,<WH5512> which<WH834> is between<WH996> Elim<WH362> and Sinai,<WH5514> on the fifteenth<WH2508> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the second<WH8145> month<WH2320> after their departing out<WH3318> of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
And the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> murmured<WH3885> against<WH5921> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> in the wilderness: <WH4057>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Would to God<WH4310> <WH5414> we had died<WH4191> by the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> when we sat<WH3427> by<WH5921> the flesh<WH1320> pots,<WH5518> and when we did eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> to the full;<WH7648> for<WH3588> ye have brought us forth<WH3318> <WH853> into<WH413> this<WH2088> wilderness,<WH4057> to kill<WH4191> <WH853> this<WH2088> whole<WH3605> assembly<WH6951> with hunger.<WH7458>

Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Behold,<WH2009> I will rain<WH4305> bread<WH3899> from<WH4480> heaven<WH8064> for you; and the people<WH5971> shall go out<WH3318> and gather<WH3950> a certain rate every day,<WH1697> <WH3117> <WH3117> that<WH4616> I may prove<WH5254> them, whether they will walk<WH1980> in my law,<WH8451> or<WH518> no.<WH3808>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that on the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> they shall prepare<WH3559> <WH853> that which<WH834> they bring in;<WH935> and it shall be<WH1961> twice<WH4932> as much as<WH5921> <WH834> they gather<WH3950> daily.<WH3117> <WH3117>

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> said<WH559> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> At even,<WH6153> then ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> hath brought you out<WH3318> <WH853> from the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt: <WH4714>

And in the morning,<WH1242> then ye shall see<WH7200> <WH853> the glory<WH3519> of the LORD;<WH3068> for that he heareth<WH8085> <WH853> your murmurings<WH8519> against<WH5921> the LORD:<WH3068> and what<WH4100> are we,<WH5168> that<WH3588> ye murmur<WH3885> against<WH5921> us?

And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> This shall be, when the LORD<WH3068> shall give<WH5414> you in the evening<WH6153> flesh<WH1320> to eat,<WH398> and in the morning<WH1242> bread<WH3899> to the full;<WH7646> for that the LORD<WH3068> heareth<WH8085> <WH853> your murmurings<WH8519> which<WH834> ye<WH859> murmur<WH3885> against<WH5921> him: and what<WH4100> are we?<WH5168> your murmurings<WH8519> are not<WH3808> against<WH5921> us, but<WH3588> against<WH5921> the LORD.<WH3068>

And Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> Say<WH559> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> Come near<WH7126> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> for<WH3588> he hath heard<WH8085> <WH853> your murmurings.<WH8519>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> as Aaron<WH175> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they looked<WH6437> toward<WH413> the wilderness,<WH4057> and, behold,<WH2009> the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> in the cloud.<WH6051>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

I have heard<WH8085> <WH853> the murmurings<WH8519> of the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> speak<WH1696> unto<WH413> them, saying,<WH559> At<WH996> even<WH6153> ye shall eat<WH398> flesh,<WH1320> and in the morning<WH1242> ye shall be filled<WH7646> with bread;<WH3899> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> that at even<WH6153> the quails<WH7958> came up,<WH5927> and covered<WH3680> <WH853> the camp:<WH4264> and in the morning<WH1242> the dew<WH2919> lay<WH1961> <WH7902> round about<WH5439> the host.<WH4264>

And when the dew<WH2919> that lay<WH7902> was gone up,<WH5927> behold,<WH2009> upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the wilderness<WH4057> there lay a small<WH1851> round thing,<WH2636> as small<WH1851> as the hoar frost<WH3713> on<WH5921> the ground.<WH776>

And when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> it, they said<WH559> one<WH376> to<WH413> another,<WH251> It<WH1931> is manna:<WH4478> for<WH3588> they knew<WH3045> not<WH3808> what<WH4100> it<WH1931> was. And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, This<WH1931> is the bread<WH3899> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath given<WH5414> you to eat.<WH402>

This <WH2088> is the thing<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath commanded,<WH6680> Gather<WH3950> of<WH4480> it every man<WH376> according to<WH6310> his eating,<WH400> an omer<WH6016> for every man,<WH1538> according to the number<WH4557> of your persons;<WH5315> take<WH3947> ye every man<WH376> for them which<WH834> are in his tents.<WH168>
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> so,<WH3651> and gathered,<WH3950> some more,<WH7235> some less.<WH4591>

And when they did mete<WH4058> it with an omer,<WH6016> he that gathered much<WH7235> had nothing over,<WH5736> <WH3808> and he that gathered little<WH4591> had no<WH3808> lack;<WH2637> they gathered<WH3950> every man<WH376> according to<WH6310> his eating.<WH400>
And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> Let no<WH408> man<WH376> leave<WH3498> of<WH4480> it till<WH5704> the morning.<WH1242>

Notwithstanding they hearkened<WH8085> not<WH3808> unto<WH413> Moses;<WH4872> but some<WH376> of them left<WH3498> of<WH4480> it until<WH5704> the morning,<WH1242> and it bred<WH7311> worms,<WH8438> and stank:<WH887> and Moses<WH4872> was wroth<WH7107> with<WH5921> them.
And they gathered<WH3950> it every morning,<WH1242> <WH1242> every man<WH376> according to<WH6310> his eating:<WH400> and when the sun<WH8121> waxed hot,<WH2552> it melted.<WH4549>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> that on the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> they gathered<WH3950> twice as much<WH4932> bread,<WH3899> two<WH8147> omers<WH6016> for one<WH259> man: and all<WH3605> the rulers<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> came<WH935> and told<WH5046> Moses.<WH4872>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, This<WH1931> is that which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath said,<WH1696> Tomorrow<WH4279> is the rest<WH7677> of the holy<WH6944> sabbath<WH7676> unto the LORD:<WH3068> bake<WH644> that<WH853> which<WH834> ye will bake<WH644> today, and seethe<WH1310> that<WH834> ye will seethe;<WH1310> and that which<WH3605> remaineth over<WH5736> lay up<WH5117> for you to be kept<WH4931> until<WH5704> the morning.<WH1242>

And they laid it up<WH5117> <WH853> till<WH5704> the morning,<WH1242> as<WH834> Moses<WH4872> bade:<WH6680> and it did not<WH3808> stink,<WH887> neither<WH3808> was<WH1961> there any worm<WH7415> therein.

And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> Eat<WH398> that today;<WH3117> for<WH3588> today<WH3117> is a sabbath<WH7676> unto the LORD:<WH3068> today<WH3117> ye shall not<WH3808> find<WH4672> it in the field.<WH7704>
Six <WH8337> days<WH3117> ye shall gather<WH3950> it; but on the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> which is the sabbath,<WH7676> in it there shall be<WH1961> none.<WH3808>
And it came to pass,<WH1961> that there went out<WH3318> some of<WH4480> the people<WH5971> on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> for to gather,<WH3950> and they found<WH4672> none.<WH3808>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> How long<WH5704> <WH575> refuse<WH3985> ye to keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687> and my laws?<WH8451>

See, <WH7200> for<WH3588> that the LORD<WH3068> hath given<WH5414> you the sabbath,<WH7676> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> he<WH1931> giveth<WH5414> you on the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> the bread<WH3899> of two days;<WH3117> abide<WH3427> ye every man<WH376> in his place,<WH8478> let no<WH408> man<WH376> go out<WH3318> of his place<WH4480> <WH4725> on the seventh<WH7637> day.<WH3117>
So the people<WH5971> rested<WH7673> on the seventh<WH7637> day.<WH3117>

And the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> called<WH7121> <WH853> the name<WH8034> thereof Manna:<WH4478> and it<WH1931> was like coriander<WH1407> seed,<WH2233> white;<WH3836> and the taste<WH2940> of it was like wafers<WH6838> made with honey.<WH1706>

And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> This<WH2088> is the thing<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commandeth,<WH6680> Fill<WH4393> an omer<WH6016> of<WH4480> it to be kept<WH4931> for your generations;<WH1755> that<WH4616> they may see<WH7200> <WH853> the bread<WH3899> wherewith<WH834> I have fed<WH398> you in the wilderness,<WH4057> when I brought you forth<WH3318> <WH853> from the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> Take<WH3947> a<WH259> pot,<WH6803> and put<WH5414> an omer<WH6016> full<WH4393> of manna<WH4478> therein,<WH8033> and lay it up<WH5117> <WH853> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> to be kept<WH4931> for your generations.<WH1755>
As <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH413> Moses,<WH4872> so Aaron<WH175> laid it up<WH5117> before<WH6440> the Testimony,<WH5715> to be kept.<WH4931>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did eat<WH398> <WH853> manna<WH4478> forty<WH705> years,<WH8141> until<WH5704> they came<WH935> to<WH413> a land<WH776> inhabited;<WH3427> they did eat<WH398> <WH853> manna,<WH4478> until<WH5704> they came<WH935> unto<WH413> the borders<WH7097> of the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667>
Now an omer<WH6016> is the tenth<WH6224> part of an ephah.<WH374>
